question: Which is not seen in polycythemia vera :
exp: Ans. is 'b' increased erythropoietin level. In polycythemia Vera increase in erythrocytes occur without any increase in level of erythropoietin. In fact erythropoietin level is decreased due to feedback by increased erythrocytes.
